title: The Ultimate Romantic Comedy In Which The Yan-mamas Absolutely Win! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life

description:
Do you like Yan(dere)mama’s and Yan(kee)mama’s with their big boba daughters?

You see, I saved two beautiful women.

One was a graceful, big-boba woman and the other was a beautiful gal-like big-boba woman.

I thought I would never see them again, but as fate turned out, they surprisingly came to me…

…And so did their daughters.

What am I supposed to do, now?

I’m stumped.>
